rooms.description: Entry hall with minimalist decor and a reception area that respects Vastu by placing the entrance in the south-east direction. It serves as transition to the living areas.

Spacious open-plan living room with natural light from east-facing windows, minimalistic design and ample seating area for joint family gatherings. Vastu principles ensure positive energy flow by aligning the main furniture along the eastern wall.
Modest dining area adjacent to the living room that encourages interaction and unity among family members. Windows on the south side are included as per Vastu for proper energy dispersion.
Functional, minimalist kitchen designed with modular cabinetry and a central island. The placement follows Vastu guidelines by aligning the stove along the east wall to harness beneficial energies.
Small pantry area adjacent to the kitchen for storage of essentials. Minimalist design with efficient space utilization.

openings.description: A wide entrance door ensuring smooth energy flow and ease of access, as per Vastu principles.
Access to a small balcony providing natural light and ventilation, aligning with the north-eastern direction for positive energy.
A dedicated entrance leading directly to a two-car garage, located on the west side to minimize disturbance of living spaces while being accessible.
